name: ListUpcomingZoomMeetings
description:
Fetches upcoming Zoom meetings for a user.

Fetches a list of upcoming meetings scheduled or invited to within the next 24 hours for a specified Zoom user. Use 'me' as the user ID for user-level apps. Requires Calendar and Contacts Integration for third-party invites.

parameters.name: zoom_user_identifier
parameters.description: The Zoom user's ID or email. Use 'me' for user-level apps to refer to the current user.

value_schema.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass [the `me` value](/docs/api/rest/using-zoom-apis/#the-me-keyword).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass [the `me` value](/docs/api/rest/using-zoom-apis/#the-me-keyword).

value_schema.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass [the `me` value](/docs/api/rest/using-zoom-apis/#the-me-keyword).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
